data.text: @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia Since December approved but no payment date. Respond pls
@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia I tried to reinstate my srd grant but my status didn't change and am not receiving any income can you please help me with that

@Takalatja00 @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia I got the same response. It's like we talking to a bladdy wall. These people are rogues. They don't want to pay us. I have been borrowing money and trying to survive yet they pockets are full. @OfficialSASSA do something or there's gonna be chaos. People won't be tolerant as me.
@OfficialSASSA @uMaMtshali @Poloko_Loko @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia Since September I have been saying, I am not registered on nsfas but every month, i get decline.
@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia It could've b'n doubled a month,4 six months...things gone expensive recently, not to mentiontaxi fare/ fuel

@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia We can only hope that soon is not next year April....when everyone must come to collect...I mean how doesn't your entity operate , or rather do they have an idea of what people have to go through to survive,those R350 are needed,and this matter should be prioritized already!!🙄
